timeline.message: Replace in tests old marshaller by new one
Remove test which doesn't test Stunner/BPMN or CM Designers

timeline.bodyText: It is probably not the best idea letting empty catch blocks, or is it?
timeline.author: LuboTerifaj

replies.bodyText: I can't imagine that Object class won't be found. But if won't we will get failing test, runtime not affected. I think it is pretty save to have it like this. Do you have better ideas?
replies.author: hasys

replies.bodyText: Hi @LuboTerifaj, is it OK to you? Or you know how to do it better?
replies.author: hasys

replies.bodyText: I see. I would let it be as it is now. Thanks!
replies.author: LuboTerifaj
